DOC.brief_summary: Narrative : Tobacco smoking remain single big cause premature death United States lead cause cancer death cancer . There therefore urgent need find effective practical way help smoker quit stay quit . This randomized trial aim evaluate two promise method help smoker quit stay quit . Design : This randomize control smoke cessation trial two stage . In Stage 1 , 225 smoker recruit assessment randomly allocate receive feedback `` Lung Age '' estimate Forced Expiratory volume air lungs one second ( FEV1 ) , exhale carbon-monoxide ( CO ) ( Intervention group 1 ) measure feed back manner design enhance motivation quit ( Control group 1 ) . All participant provide group counsel ( 6 weekly session , target Quit Date day second group meeting ) , transdermal nicotine patch . Main outcome measure : Stage 1 , Past week tobacco abstinence biochemically validate exhaled CO < 10 ppm visit 7 ( 4 week Target Quit Date ) . In Stage 2 ( start visit 7 ) , participant attend visit 7 ( 28 day Target Quit Date ) , randomly allocate receive either Forever Free relapse prevention material ( Intervention 2 ) http : //www.smokefree.gov/pdf.html Surgeon General 's Guide `` How Tobacco Smoke Causes Disease '' ( Control 2 ) http : //www.cdc.gov/tobacco/data_statistics/sgr/2010/consumer_booklet/index.htm . All randomized participant receive follow-up phone call week later remind read use material give , attend follow visit ( 8 ) , 6 month initial Target Quit Date . Main outcome measure : Stage 2 . Among smoked previous week visit 7 , sustain tobacco abstinence ( include tobacco use prior 7 day ) , validate exhaled CO < 10 ppm 6 month visit ( 8 ) AND smoke 7 consecutive day prior 5 month ( definition relapse study ) . Hypothesis : Smokers provide lung age feedback assessment high quit rate 28 day target quit date .
